article: shiite militia leader moqtada sadr ceded control of his najaf shrine stronghold friday to representatives of the religious leadership following a deal with grand ayatollah ali al-sistani to end three weeks of deadly fighting .
abstract: shiite militia leader surrenders control of shrine stronghold
